name: Art Coloring - Color by Number
description:
Art Coloring - Coloring Book & Color By Number is an art drawing game to color modern artwork with coloring by numbers. A trending number coloring book and coloring puzzle game for everyone. So many free and fascinating coloring pages, pics and jigsaws in this coloring book game. Good taste of art from Art Coloring without any skills, pencils or papers!

Art Coloring is NOVELTY EASY, FUN, RELAXING, FREE and ADDICTIVE!

Feel bored or stressed? Busy about working? Color your life with our adult coloring puzzle book!

Art Coloring is different from traditional coloring book app , it is more modern, delicate designed and diversified, and every painting is color by number. It is easier to build your own gallery and art books. You only need to choose the color block and fill in the area with same numbers. Paint by number!

There is a great variety of themes that you can choose: Animals Nature , Scenery , People , Architecture , Fashion , Lifestyle , Food , Beauty , unicorn , mandala ,etc.
Special pictures for special days, anniversaries like thanksgiving theme, family theme and Christmas theme, etc.
Different love stories and chapters.
Art Coloring is your best choice.
Come and Join the coloring journey
Relax at any time to enjoy special coloring game!!!!

Key Features
- Start Color painting ANYTIME & ANYWHERE: no pencil, paper or other tools needed
- Various themes for all tastes: animals, Scenery, People, Architecture,Fashion, Beauty, Unicorn, Rainbow, mandala and many more…which topic do you prefer?
- There are free hints if you get sucked in finding the areas that is marked numbers.
- Reward: Daily rewards and many kinds of reward waiting for you
- Quick Sharing: Show your excellent painting with your friends on social networks and friends circle
- Color or recolor: Whatever you want!!
- Daily Updates different gorgeous trending pictures, free happy and art tap games!
- Big World Little Me - Different painting represent different stories, now travel with me and open special chapter.
- Gorgeous jigsaw pics, collect one by one.
- Share your own artwork on the social media（Facebook, Message, Instagram, etc）
- Review painting process by watching short video after completing color by number!
- Save picture and set it as desktop wallpaper and lock screen wallpaper!

Wonderful discovery
- Login to color Daily pictures every day and find Monthly Best
- Paint 4+ parts of Jigsaw for challenge
- Enjoy well-known Artists’ works
- Immerse yourself in Goth girls and Magic world
- Feel nature in Animal Kingdom
- Experience Sweet Love and Charming
- Grow up to Travel and Live wonderfully

Join the interesting activities and get bonus pictures!
- Turn your own photos into paintings!
- Show your idea to decide pictures!
- Express yourself with friends in the group!

Enjoy your art coloring time everyday!
